metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22569 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue in protobuf-java allowed the interleaving of com.google.protobuf.UnknownFieldSet fields in such a way that would be processed out of order. A small malicious payload can occupy the parser for several minutes by creating large numbers of short-lived objects that cause frequent, repeated pauses. We recommend upgrading libraries beyond the vulnerable versions.

criterions.comment: protobuf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
